description: {"blocks":[{"key":"32qlv","text":"We describe a non-radioactive assay that we deploy for analysing LRRK1 protein kinase activity in vitro using Rab7A as a substrate. This assay can be used to measure the intrinsic activity of LRRK1 immunoprecipitated from cells as well as to assess the impact of mutations on LRRK1 activity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":95,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: transfection of HEK293, LRRK1 activity, Immunoprecipitation , ASAPCRN

steps.section: Transient transfection of HEK293 cells for analysis of over-expressed LRRK1 activity in vitro:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5ned7","text":"Transfect HEK293 cells at around 60-70% confluency.
